Html:
Excellent work here.  I was wondering if anyone knows how to get the set of driving directions that goes with the route plotted between two markers?  Thanks in advance.

Bob
you mean the text that explains where go?

yes, exactly. Like take a left on oak street, then a right on elm street, etc.

Bob

Sometimes people like a written explanation of how to get to their destination.  Also, it is sometimes hard to read street names (expecially if they are small streets) on the image map.  This way the user has both an image of the path they take along with step by step instructions as well (maybe they will print out the instructions).

Could you point me in the right direction since you have been through the web services documentation?  All I need is a link to the general area.  After I figure it out I'll send the code to you to include in your well written application.

Bob
